ext_descriptions.ext_description:
A Contextual_item_shape is a kind of Item_shape that identifies the shape of a product version in the context of its use in another product version.
The product version whose contextual shape is identified, is the product version associated with the related_view of the View_definition_usage.
Flexible part may have several shapes, each associated with a particular occurrence of the part in assemblies.
the View_definition_usage that identifies the using product version and the used product version.
the Product_view_definition that identifies the definition of the product version whose shape is considered.
An Item_shape identifies the shape of shapeable_item.
the shapeable_item whose shape is identified.
a text that provides further information about the property. The value of this attribute need not be specified.
a text that provides further an identifier for the Item_shape. The value of this attribute need not be specified.

A Characterizable_object is an object that may be characterized with properties but that cannot be considered as a product or an activity.
An orbit of a satellite is an example of Characterizable_object.
A Characterizable_object may be used as an environmental condition under which the properties of a product are measured.
If a product has a set of properties that are measured within a particular atmosphere, the atmosphere may be described with an instance of the entity data type Characterizable_object.
a string by which the Characterizable_object is known.
a text that provides further informaton about the Characterizable_object. The value of this attribute need not be specified.

A Shape_element identifies a portion of a shape.
The threaded portion of the shape of a bolt may be represented as a Shape_element, so that other properties, such as surface finish, may be associated with it.
the Item_shape that the Shape_element is a part of.
a text that provides additional information about the Shape_element. The value of this attribute need not be specified.
the name of the Shape_element.
the identifier that distiguishes the Shape_element. The value of this attribute need not be specified.
A Shape_element_relationship is a relationship between two instances of Shape_element.
a text that provides additional information about the Shape_element_relationship. The value of this attribute need not be specified.
the second of the two instances of Shape_element objects related by a Shape_element_relationship.
the first of the two instances of Shape_element objects related by a Shape_element_relationship.
the string that specifies the type of the relationship.

A Shape_dependent_property_representation is the representation of a characteristic derived from or imposed to an Item_shape or a Shape_element.
The center of mass is an example of shape dependent property, of a shape, that can be represented by a cartesian point.
The area and the volumes are examples of characteristic that can be represented by a measure value with unit.
A Shape_dependent_property_representation is independent of the representations of the shape.
The present version of this application module does not enable to represent whether the characteristics has been imposed or was derived. It is expected that a future version will add this capability.
the Item_shape or the Shape_element from which the characteristic has been derived or imposed.
the Representation that contains the items that express the characteristic. Depending on the type of shape characteristic, the shape_characteristic may need to be a Geometric_model.
a text that provides further information about the Shape_dependent_property_representation. The value of this attribute need not be specified.
A Shape_description_association is an association a geometric representation with a shape characteristic.

the instance of an element of shape_select that is represented.
In case the represented_characteristic is a Shape_element_relationship, the represented characteristic is the related shape_element in the context of its relating shape_element.
the Geometric_model that provides the representation.

the string that specifies the role of the representation with respect to the property. The value of this attribute need not be specified. 'simplified representation', 'idealized representation' are examples of role.
a text that provides further information about the Shape_description_association. The value of this attribute need not be specified.
